article_title: If GOP Frontrunner Ben Carson Was President, Here's What Would Happen to the U.S. Economy
article_text: You need to LOG IN to edit your watchlist.

article_metadata.description: You might be saying goodbye to the IRS, ObamaCare, our current tax system, and some entitlements if Ben Carson is elected the next President of the United States.
article_metadata.author: Valerie Young
